theVampire:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theVampire:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theVampire:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theVampire:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theVampire:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theVampire:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theVampire:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theVampire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theVampire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theVampire:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theVampire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theVampire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theVampire:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
